sections.purpose: To manually measure temperature of baths, chambers, and solutions.
sections.scope: Applicable to routine temperature checks in pharmacology.
procedure: Ensure the thermometer is intact with no separation of liquid column.
Immerse the bulb in the medium without touching container walls.
Allow sufficient time for the reading to stabilize.
Read the temperature at eye level.
Remove, clean, and store the thermometer safely after use.
precautions: Do not expose beyond its specified temperature range.
Handle glass thermometers carefully to avoid breakage.
Clean spills promptly if using mercury thermometers as per hazardous waste SOP.
